title: Ocean Week Reef Update
body:
Hey everyone!

I want to give you all an update on where we're at with the Nautilus-themed artificial reef. We have been exploring potential sites and toured our first one last week.

We have been working with a marine biologist and a company that specialises in artificial reef creation to identify the most suitable sites. They are all uniquely different, because the ocean is an amazingly diverse place, so they all have different requirements that impacts the design.

As you know this is a slow process, so we can't say it will be happening soon, but progress is steady and we will keep you updated as we go!

If you have any questions please fire them off, but there is a lot we can’t decide on until we find the site.

gg,

CptStupendous

replies.body: What locations are you considering so far?
Anywhere in Oceania is on the table, as long as it's going to be good for the environment.
Keep up the great work, great things take time.
Can you make a "process-like" video? Showing the steps taken into making this reef! Talking to biologists, going under water, making the design etc etc :D
We want to document the journey yep, just need to figure out the best way to do it. A video is definitely an option.

I'm not from OCE but i'd like to see the outcome of this project as well. Please make a video that shows the progress of the making, the placement of the reef and maybe a small snapshot of how the reef looks like when the water creatures took over. 
It would be nice to see how it affects the environment of the sea :)
Are you confident in getting all the summoner names (that were eligible) to fit on the statue? Delivering such a task sounds daunting.
We'll figure it out one way or another!!
Will my depression ever go???
Do you guys at riot have an idea of how many names are going onto the statue, if so can we get a rough idea on it?
We're still double checking this data, will announce the number and the names at some point.

I can give a recommendation, a place in Queensland on the Gold Coast.


It's a good excuse to give the company a free trip while you're at it ;)
Great! Want to Tweet it to me?

Do you have an estimated finish date? Will you stream live when its being lowered into the ocean as this would be cool to see? Will there be an unveiling party so people can come and watch it being but in?

No estimate on the finish date yet. We'll definitely be taking the 'do right' rather than 'do quickly' road on this. It's important to make sure the reef has the impact on the environment we were all hoping for!
how large will the statue be?
We don't know yet, need to find the site first so we know what's appropriate
i see
My mark on the world XD
How much swag will Nautilus have once he's in the ocean?
I imagine the fish will eat all his swag. The sea bass will have at it as well.
wtf i thought they were putting it into summoners rift..
